title: Star Wars: Shadows of the Empire (GOG)

Title: STAR WARSâ„¢ SHADOWS OF THE EMPIREâ„¢
Genre: Action - Adventure - Sci-fi
Works on: Windows (XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10)
Languages: Audio and text: English
Features: single-player
Released: March 1, 1997
Size: 264 MB
Company: Lucasfilm / Disney
Rating:	ESRB Rating: Teen (with Animated Violence)
Store page: https://www.gog.com/game/star_wars_shadows_of_the_empire

About:
A long time ago in a galaxy far, far away...
As Luke Skywalker and the Rebel Alliance struggle to defeat Darth Vader and the Empire, a new threat arises. Dark Prince Xizor, head of the Black Sun crime syndicate, aspires to take Darth Vader's place at the Emperor's side. To do that, he must eliminate young Skywalker. As Dash Rendar, it's up to you to protect Luke and help the Alliance defeat the evil Xizor. Watch out for infamous bounty hunters and deadly stormtroopers! May the Force be with you!
A gripping new plotline, with new characters and environments...find out what happened between Star Warsâ„¢ The Empire Strikes Backâ„¢ and Star Warsâ„¢ Return of the Jediâ„¢.
Five gameplay modes - in a variety of vehicles and spacecraft - from the heavily armored Outrider, to snowspeeders, hovertrains, jet packs, and speeder bikes.
Action-packed Star Warsâ„¢ locales - including Mos Eisley and the ice planet Hoth. New locales, like the sewers of Imperial City, Xizor's palace, Gall Spaceport and the dreaded junkyards of Ord Mantel.

Minimum system requirements - Windows: XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10
Processor: 1.8 GHz
Memory: 1 GB RAM
Graphics: 3D graphics card compatible with DirectX 9.0c and 256 MB VRAM
Mouse, Keyboard
